sentences.en: He had never known him to be so chatty and cordial.
sentences.cn: 他从没见过他如此健谈，如此友善。

sentences.en: He said the two countries had close and cordial relations.
sentences.cn: 他说两国之间有着密切友好的关系。

sentences.en: He was cordial enough, but he gave me bad advice.
sentences.cn: 他倒是很热情, 但是给我出的主意却糟糕透了.

sentences.en: He was cordial in all his letters.
sentences.cn: 他的每封来信都很热情.

sentences.en: He'd never drunk any wine before, except blackberry cordial.
sentences.cn: 他除了黑莓甜酒外从来未喝过酒.

sentences.en: I am very grateful to you for the cordial hospitality you accorded me.
sentences.cn: 承蒙热情招待,十分感激.

sentences.en: It pleases her brother to see us cordial, and that pleases me.
sentences.cn: 她哥哥看见我们和睦就高兴, 这也使我高兴.

sentences.en: Neither Baker nor Levy seemed eager to disturb the cordial atmosphere by discussing more sensitive issues.
sentences.cn: 贝克和利维似乎都不愿谈及更为敏感的话题而破坏了友好的氛围。

sentences.en: She formed the most cordial opinion of his talents.
sentences.cn: 她对他的才能心悦诚服,留下了良好印象.

sentences.en: She waited for them, smiling shyly to answer their cordial faces.
sentences.cn: 她等待着他们, 用羞怯的笑容来回答他们恳挚的脸色.

sentences.en: The banquet was full of cordial and friendly atmosphere from beginning to end.
sentences.cn: 宴会始终充满亲切友好的气氛.

sentences.en: The meeting of the old classmates was extremely cordial.
sentences.cn: 老同学聚会在一起,分外亲热.

sentences.en: The talks were conducted in a cordial atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 会谈在友好的气氛中进行。

sentences.en: The whole air of menace was accentuated by the fact that he was so cordial and soft-voiced.
sentences.cn: 他如此亲切，说话轻声细语，这更加重了威胁的语气。

sentences.en: We maintain cordial relations with our neighbors.
sentences.cn: 我们与邻里保持亲切友好的关系.

words.tran_cn: 补品；兴奋剂；甜香酒，甘露酒

trans.tran_en: friendly but quite polite and formal
